2.details: Relivator offers unlimited possibilities, with all the necessary tools ready for you.

3.details: Development is mainly by one person. Donations can help speed up the process. Click below to donate. Or visit the Donate to Relivator (https://relivator.bleverse.com/en/donate) page to learn more details. Thank you for your support! ðŸ©·

landing.about: Stop jumping from one starter to the next. With Relivator, your possibilities are endless! You can create anything you want; all the tools are ready and waiting for you. Our goal is to create the world's most feature-rich and globally accessible Next.js starter. It offers more than just codeâ€”it's an experience.

auth.description: Deploy with a versatile authentication system using NextAuth.js and Clerk. See .env.example for details.
auth.title: User Authentication: Secure & Flexible

database.description: Maintain performance with Drizzle ORM, switching MySQL and Postgres on-the-fly. Deploy with Planetscale, Vercel, Railway, Neon, and more.
database.title: Database Integration: Robust & Versatile

devtools.ambitions-description: Relivator offers unlimited possibilities with all tools ready for you.
devtools.description: Robust subscription system with free and paid plans. Check README.md for more.
devtools.title: Stripe Subscriptions: Powerful & Flexible

interface.description: Create stunning UI with Flowbite and Shadcn UI components, styled with Radix and Tailwind CSS. VSCode recommended.
interface.title: Components: Elegant & Functional

nextjs.description: Seamless navigation with App Router, Layouts, and Loading UI. Explore powerful API routes and more.
nextjs.title: Next.js 15: Enhanced Experience

text.description: Manipulate app with Server and Client Components. Use modern version of React Hooks and additional features for a smooth development experience.
text.title: React 19: Modern Development

metadata.description: Build More Efficient, Engaging, and Profitable Online Stores: Relivator Enhances your eCommerce with the Power of shadcn/ui, Next.js 15, React 19, and more
